messages.subject: Thanks bunches!:)
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to thank everyone who made suggestions for non- competitive games!  They were all VERY helpful! I especially like the suggestion (can t remember
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to thank everyone who made suggestions for non-
competitive games! They were all VERY helpful!

I especially like the suggestion (can't remember who it came from) of
turning ordinary games into non-competitive games by changing the
rules! I have a ton of games, and my husband made the same
suggestion:)

Also the book (Everybody Wins!)recommendation! It sounds wonderful!
Right up my alley!

Thanks a bunch!
Molly

p.s. so glad I found this site!
